Subject: Devices are showing Offline
Description: Our more than 50% client system are showing offline. Please help to fix this issue.
What_We_Know__c:
- clients look offline - not connected. IP is set up correctly
- 1pm reschedule
- cleared server disk space as it was 93% occupied
- issue was caused by customer's firewall
Solution_Comment__c: the issue was caused by the customer's firewall blocking the EPP server's IP
Account_Name__c: The Cloud Mail Store Inc / Cyberspace Networking Systems
